conversations.conversation: I love this show very much,i have watched Gilmore Girls DVD from season 1 to season 7,the complete dvd collection.I do think Gilmore Girls changed some stereotypes for women.One thing,i think is the Gilmore Girls series dvd brings a lot of things to light.Another thing is the character,Lorelai have Rory, she was able to make it on her own at 16 year old.The Gilmore Girls show also create a good relationship with her mother.Two of things above changed stereotypes for women.Source: http://www.dvdsetshop.com/products/Gilmore-Girls-Seasons-1-7-DVD-Boxset-DVDS-1254.html

I am also the super fans of this tv series the same to Entourage series DVD box set , The Simpsons series DVD box set , NCIS series DVD box set.I am concern the information about modern family.I am also want to know the time of the fourth season comes out on dvd.Now it is available with Modern Family series dvd box set(seasons 1-3).On May 10, 2012, ABC announced that it had renewed Modern Family for a fourth season.Just looking forward to modern family season 4 on dvd.Source: http://shangmei520.livejournal.com/16879.html

I LOVE Modern Family.One thing is it is so funny.I think its the writing for me, for me at least.Another thing is emotion,if you don't like this show then you have absolutely no emotion, whatsoever. Yea, shows make you laugh, but this makes you literally LAUGH and cry from laughter.
